title: Client (Patcher Ux) Unable to Load
body:
I have been experiencing this problem since early April of 2017. Whenever I try to open the Lol Client (Patcher Ux?) it just doesn't load. I have tried to opened it from the content folder, an exterior hard-drive. And, I have contact Riot team to change the DNS and ran ping-plotter and send them the logs but it is still not working. I am using a Mac btw :). Thanks guys. 

It is basically sth like this but with the new season 7 client. 
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Ms9NlPEA-client-home-screen-wont-load-problem-for-bilgewater-event-rewards

replies.body:
I went ahead and pulled up your old ticket to see what went on in there, and it looks like you might have missed one of the little steps that might fix this all up for ya. 

Check out the steps in [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9) to setup your Mac Admin rights for League. Let me know if this doesn't work though and we can get you another ticket setup with our techies.
